title: Ayurvedic Foot Cream (Vetiver + Sesame)
excerpt: Rich night cream combining shea butter, sesame oil and vetiver infusion to heal cracked heels and deeply nourish feet.
content:
## What Is This Foot Cream?
A deeply nourishing night cream formulated to repair and moisturize dry, cracked heels. Vetiver provides cooling, calming support while sesame and shea deliver deep hydration.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Vetiver cools Pitta and calms the nerves; sesame oil provides deep, warming nourishment that strengthens tissues and supports repair.

### Key Benefits
- Heals and softens cracked heels.
- Deep overnight hydration and repair.
- Cooling vetiver balances foot inflammation.

## Ingredients
- Shea butter
- Cold-pressed sesame oil
- Vetiver oil/infusion
- Vitamin E

## Usage Instructions
- Apply generously at night, wear cotton socks to lock in nourishment. Use nightly until heels improve, then maintain 2â€“3 times weekly.

## Packaging
- Jar with hygienic spatula included.

## Safety & Consultation
- Patch-test for sensitivity. Avoid open or infected wounds; consult a podiatrist for severe foot conditions.

## Why Choose This Cream?
A ritual-grade foot treatment combining deep oils and cooling botanicals to restore comfort and resilience.
